trans-unit.source: Specifies the available application-specific <paramref name="gesture" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定可用的應用程式專屬 <paramref name="gesture" />。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別通常不是在 XAML 中使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to identify a gesture on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何在識別手勢<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> called `inkCanvas1` and that its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture> event has been connected to the event handler in this example.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>呼叫`inkCanvas1`且其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>事件已連接到在此範例中的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Recognizes all application-specific gestures.
trans-unit.target: 辨識所有的應用程式專屬筆跡。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The arrow can be drawn in single stroke or in two strokes where one stroke is the line and the other is the arrow head.
trans-unit.target: 箭號可用單一筆劃繪製或用兩個筆劃繪製，其中一個筆劃為線條，另一個筆劃為箭頭。

trans-unit.source: Do not use more than two strokes to draw the arrow.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用兩個以上的筆畫來描繪箭號。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The arrow can be drawn in single stroke or in two strokes where one stroke is the line and the other is the arrow head.
trans-unit.target: 箭號可用單一筆劃繪製或用兩個筆劃繪製，其中一個筆劃為線條，另一個筆劃為箭頭。

trans-unit.source: Do not use more than two strokes to draw the arrow.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用兩個以上的筆畫來描繪箭號。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The arrow can be drawn in single stroke or in two strokes where one stroke is the line and the other is the arrow head.
trans-unit.target: 箭號可用單一筆劃繪製或用兩個筆劃繪製，其中一個筆劃為線條，另一個筆劃為箭頭。

trans-unit.source: Do not use more than two strokes to draw the arrow.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用兩個以上的筆畫來描繪箭號。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The arrow can be drawn in single stroke or in two strokes where one stroke is the line and the other is the arrow head.
trans-unit.target: 箭號可用單一筆劃繪製或用兩個筆劃繪製，其中一個筆劃為線條，另一個筆劃為箭頭。

trans-unit.source: Do not use more than two strokes to draw the arrow.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用兩個以上的筆畫來描繪箭號。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The upward stroke must be twice as long as the smaller downward stroke.
trans-unit.target: 向上筆劃的長度必須為較小的向下筆劃的兩倍。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: Both sides of the chevron must be drawn as equal as possible.
trans-unit.target: ＞形箭號兩端的大小必須盡可能一致。

trans-unit.source: The angle must be sharp and end in a point.
trans-unit.target: 角度必須銳利並且以點做為結尾。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: Both sides of the chevron must be drawn as equal as possible.
trans-unit.target: ＞形箭號兩端的大小必須盡可能一致。

trans-unit.source: The angle must be sharp and end in a point.
trans-unit.target: 角度必須銳利並且以點做為結尾。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: Both sides of the chevron must be drawn as equal as possible.
trans-unit.target: ＞形箭號兩端的大小必須盡可能一致。

trans-unit.source: The angle must be sharp and end in a point.
trans-unit.target: 角度必須銳利並且以點做為結尾。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: Both sides of the chevron must be drawn as equal as possible.
trans-unit.target: ＞形箭號兩端的大小必須盡可能一致。

trans-unit.source: The angle must be sharp and end in a point.
trans-unit.target: 角度必須銳利並且以點做為結尾。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The circle must be drawn in a single stroke without lifting the pen.
trans-unit.target: 圓形必須以單一筆劃繪製，不能拿起畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: Start the curlicue on the word you intend to cut.
trans-unit.target: 在您要剪下的字組上啟動花體。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The two circles must overlap each other and be drawn in a single stroke without lifting the pen.
trans-unit.target: 兩個圓形必須互相重疊，而且必須以單一筆劃繪製，不能拿起畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: Start the double-curlicue on the word you intend to copy.
trans-unit.target: 在您要複製的字組上啟動雙花體。

trans-unit.source: Signifies a mouse double-click.
trans-unit.target: 表示按兩下滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: The two taps must be made quickly to result in the least amount of slippage and the least duration between taps.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個筆劃必須快速完成，以產生最少的滑動以及將筆劃間的間隔縮到最短。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the taps must be as close to each other as possible.
trans-unit.target: 此外，筆劃必須盡可能靠近彼此。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn as a single fast flick in the downward direction.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆跡必須繪製為向下的單一快速筆觸。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the down stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從下筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The two sides must be as equal in length as possible and at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 兩邊的長度必須盡可能相同，而且必須呈直角。

trans-unit.source: Signifies pressing an ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 表示按下 ENTER 鍵。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the down stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從下筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The left stroke is about twice as long as the up stroke, and the two strokes must be at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 左筆劃約為上筆劃的兩倍長，且兩個筆劃必須呈直角。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the down stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從下筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The two sides must be as equal in length as possible and at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 兩邊的長度必須盡可能相同，而且必須呈直角。

trans-unit.source: Signifies pressing the spacebar.
trans-unit.target: 表示按下空格鍵。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the down stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從下筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The right stroke must be about twice as long as the up stroke, and the two strokes must be at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 右筆劃必須為上筆劃的兩倍長，且兩個筆劃必須呈直角。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the down stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從下筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The two strokes must be as close to each other as possible.
trans-unit.target: 兩個筆劃必須盡可能靠近彼此。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The line must be drawn first and then the dot drawn quickly and as close to the line as possible.
trans-unit.target: 必須先繪製直線，然後快速繪製點，且點必須盡量靠近直線。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a backspace.
trans-unit.target: 指定退格鍵。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn as a single fast flick to the left.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆跡必須繪製為往左的單一快速筆觸。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the left stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從左筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The two sides are as equal in length as possible and at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 兩邊的長度必須盡可能相同，而且必須呈直角。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the left stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從左筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The two sides are as equal in length as possible and at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 兩邊的長度必須盡可能相同，而且必須呈直角。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the left stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從左筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The two sides must be as equal in length as possible and at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 兩邊的長度必須盡可能相同，而且必須呈直角。

trans-unit.source: Recognizes no application-specific gestures.
trans-unit.target: 無法辨識任何的應用程式專屬筆跡。

trans-unit.source: Signifies a space.
trans-unit.target: 表示空格。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn as a single fast flick to the right.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆跡必須繪製為往右的單一快速筆觸。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the right stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從右筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The two sides must be as equal in length as possible and at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 兩邊的長度必須盡可能相同，而且必須呈直角。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the right stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從右筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The two strokes must be as close to each other as possible.
trans-unit.target: 兩個筆劃必須盡可能靠近彼此。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the right stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從右筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The two sides must be as equal in length as possible and at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 兩邊的長度必須盡可能相同，而且必須呈直角。

trans-unit.source: Erases content.
trans-unit.target: 清除內容。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn as a single stroke that has at least three back-and-forth motions.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆跡必須以單一筆劃繪製且至少要有三次的來回動作。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The semicircle must be drawn from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 半圓形必須由左至右繪製。

trans-unit.source: The two ends of the semicircle should be as horizontally even as possible.
trans-unit.target: 半圓形的兩端應該盡可能保持水平。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The semicircle must be drawn from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 半圓形必須由右至左繪製。

trans-unit.source: The two ends of the semicircle should be as horizontally even as possible.
trans-unit.target: 半圓形的兩端應該盡可能保持水平。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The square can be drawn in one or two strokes.
trans-unit.target: 正方形可以用一或兩個筆劃繪製。

trans-unit.source: In one stroke, draw the entire square without lifting the pen.
trans-unit.target: 如用一個筆劃，則繪製整個正方形時不能拿起畫筆。

trans-unit.source: In two strokes, draw three sides of the square and use another stroke to draw the remaining side.
trans-unit.target: 如用兩個筆劃，請用一個筆劃繪製出正方形的三個邊，然後再用另一個筆劃繪製剩下的一邊。

trans-unit.source: Do not use more than two strokes to draw the square.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用兩個以上的筆畫來描繪正方形。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The star must have exactly five points and be drawn in a single stroke without lifting the pen.
trans-unit.target: 星型必須剛好有五個點，而且必須以單一筆劃繪製，不能拿起畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Signifies a mouse click.
trans-unit.target: 表示按一下滑鼠。

trans-unit.source: For the least amount of slippage, the tap must be made quickly.
trans-unit.target: 必須快速完成點擊，以將滑動減到最少。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: The triangle must be drawn in a single stroke, without lifting the pen.
trans-unit.target: 三角型必須以單一筆劃繪製，不能拿起畫筆。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn as a single fast flick in the upward direction.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆跡必須繪製為向上的單一快速筆觸。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the up stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從上筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The two strokes must be as close to each other as possible.
trans-unit.target: 兩個筆劃必須盡可能靠近彼此。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the up stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從上筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The two sides must be as equal in length as possible and at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 兩邊的長度必須盡可能相同，而且必須呈直角。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the up stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從上筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The left stroke must be about twice as long as the up stroke, and the two strokes must be at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 左筆劃必須為上筆劃的兩倍長，且兩個筆劃必須呈直角。

trans-unit.source: Has no suggested semantic behavior or action.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何建議的語意行為或動作。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the up stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從上筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The two sides must be as equal in length as possible and at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 兩邊的長度必須盡可能相同，而且必須呈直角。

trans-unit.source: Signifies pressing a TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 表示按下 TAB 鍵。

trans-unit.source: This gesture must be drawn in a single stroke starting with the up stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆勢必須以單一筆劃繪製，從上筆劃開始。

trans-unit.source: The right stroke must be about twice as long as the up stroke, and the two strokes must be at a right angle.
trans-unit.target: 右筆劃必須為上筆劃的兩倍長，且兩個筆劃必須呈直角。
